commonAddYourReferenceForThisExport: Add your reference for this export
commonAddYourReferenceHint: Enter a reference to help you identify this {{journeyText}} within the service. This reference is for your own use and will not appear on the final certificate. For example, you could choose a reference number from your organisation.
commonBackToProgressHiddenText: back to your progress page link
commonDashboardFeedbackText: Have two minutes to help improve this service?
commonHelpToImproveService: to help us improve this service
commonHelpLinkGetHelpExportingFish: Get help exporting fish from the UK (gov.uk)
commonDashboardForFishNotCaught: (for fish not caught by UK flagged vessels)
commonDeleteDocumentDraftDeleteConfirmat: Are you sure you want to delete this {{journeyText}}?
commonCopyVoidConfirmationHeader: Are you sure you want to void the original {{journeyText}}?
processingStatementCopyVoidConfirmationD: Yes, create a copy of the {{journeyText}} then void the original
storageNotesCopyVoidConfirmationDocument: Yes, create a copy of the {{journeyText}} then void the original
catchCertificateCopyVoidConfirmationDocu: Yes, create a copy of the {{journeyText}} then void the original

commonAddExporterDetailsWarningContent:
Add the name and address of the company (or individual) responsible for this export.
This information will appear on the final {{journeyText}} so please make sure the exporter details are correct before continuing.
commonAddExporterDetailsExporterCompanyN: If you do not have a company name, enter the full name of the person responsible for the export.
ccAddExporterDetailsExporterNameOfPerson: Name of person responsible for this export
commonErrorPageTitle: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
commonErrorPagesaveText: Everything you have done so far has been saved.
commonAddExporterDetailsExporterAddressR: Your registration address could not be accessed. Please add the exporter’s address
commonWhatExportersAddressEnterPostCodeH: If you cannot find the address or you need to add a non-UK address, click the link 'Enter the address manually'
commonWhatExportersAddressNotFoundText: I can not find the address in the list
commonWhatExportersAddressSubBuildingNam: For example, the flat or apartment number
commonWhatExportDestinationHintSelectThe: This is the main destination country for the export, not the countries it is passing through. This information will not appear on the final document.
commonConfirmDocumentVoidPageHeader: Are you sure you want to void this {{journeyText}}?
ccAddCatchDetailsSpeciesDetailsBestResul: For best results, search for the common English name or the FAO code (if known) as species nicknames are not supported.
ccAddCatchDetailsSpeciesDetailsCannotFin: If you cannot find the species and it is not exempt, call
commonSummaryPageNotificationBannerMessa: Due to improvements in the way addresses are managed, the exporter’s address in this document has been reloaded from your Defra account. Please check the address is correct and change if necessary
commonStorageToNonManipulationMsg: From January 2026, Storage Documents will change to Non-manipulation Documents
